Dusk draws near, and the villagers gather to decide who they are lynching this evening... Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
It is now day time. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations / defenses / talk.
Night has fallen. Everyone heads to bed, weary after another stressful day. Night players: you have {0} seconds use your actions!
The villagers have cast their votes, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} is dead. {1}
Unable to come up with a proper decision on who to lynch, the mob returns to their homes for the night, frustrated...
Something is fishy, for no one voted! No lynchmob tonight.....
The villagers gather in the morning, but do not see {0}. They wander over to the house, to find {0} disemboweled, an old badge shoved down their throat.
Morning comes, and to everyone's dismay, impaled on top of the church's cross is {0}, the Guardian Angel.

As everyone comes out of their houses, the find pieces of a shotgun strewn about... then legs.. then fingers.. then floating in the fountain in the town square, the body of {0}, dead from a werewolf. You have lost your gunner.
The villagers awake in the morning, to find the disemboweled remains of {0} haunched over a ouija board and tarot cards. The Seer is dead.
Everyone wakes to the smell of burning alcohol and wood... the pub is on fire!!!! After putting the fire out, the remains of {0} are found, torn apart....
As the sun rises above the village, they find {0} sitting over an ouija board, but with a deck of.... bicycle playing cards??? WHAT A FOOL!
As everyone rises in the morning, they smell a terrible stink. They follow the smell to find {0} shredded apart in the pig pen, head missing. NOMNOMNOMNOM {1}
A noticeable stench is coming from {0}'s house... the village inspects it to find a body lying in front of a dark altar... a cultist has been killed by the hunter!
The villagers gather the next morning in the village center, to sighs of relief - it appears there was no attack the previous night.

Oh no! The wolves eated you. NOMNOMNOMNOM

{0} was a wolf! You got eaten. In your dying breaths, at least you remember who you were: the Harlot!
{0} slipped into the wrong house last night! Their slutty remains are found pinned to the church doors with an iron rod... how sad :(
{0} slips into {1}'s house, ready to have a little fun to ease off the stress. However, they instead find a werewolf eating {1}! The werewolf quickly turns on {0} and jumps.... {0} is dead.

Looks like {0} came back positive after a night with the Harlot! The gunner got revenge. {1} is dead.
Suddenly, a shot rings out. The village turns to see {0} standing over {1}'s body, a gun still aimed at the head. {2}
The werewolf has won!
The werewolves have won!
The villagers have won! All the wolves have died....
Oh no! You lynched the Tanner! He wins the game, silly.

The village has chosen to hang you! The fear of death makes you regain some clarity, and you know what to do... This is your last chance, choose to shoot someone as you go down!
{0} fumbles for their pistol as the noose tightens, but cannot get it in time, and falls to their death with a loud snap of their neck...
{0} whips out their pistol, looks at the crowd..... and cannot make a decision on who to shoot. They fall to their death, accepting their fate...
As the noose tightens around {0}'s neck, they whip out a pistol, arm it, take aim, and pull the trigger, shooting {1} as the floor drops out beneath them! {1} falls over, dead. {2}
The gunner has shot you! The fear of death makes you regain some clarity, and you know what to do... This is your last chance, choose to shoot someone as you go down!
The shot to {0} was too much, so much that they couldn't even reach for their sidearm, as they lay in a pool of blood.....
As {0} lays there, gasping for their final breath, they can't decide who to shoot.... and accept their fate..
As the bullet pierces {0}, they fall to the ground.... but not without grasping their pistol, and firing upon {1}, who takes a bullet right between the eyes. {2}
{0} went to {1}'s house and is now dead!
The wolves tried to attack the hunter last night, but the hunter was able to take one down with them as he died! {0} has died (wolf)
The wolf tried to attack the hunter last night, but the hunter was able to take the wolf {0} down with their rifle!
{0} is dead!

It seemed a quiet enough night for {0}, but they were wrong. The villagers gather in the morning to find {0} split from head to toe, but oddly the liver was missing..... The serial killer has struck again! {1}

Morning comes, and the remaining two villagers walk out to the town square. {0} takes a look at {1}, gets a big grin on their face, pulls out a knife, and takes {1} out.
Everyone in the village has died.... there's nothing but bodies left. No one wins this round, except the vultures...

As the sun rises, {0} and {1} walk out into the village. {0} pulls out their knife, and jumps at {1}. {1} pulls out a pistol and fires a shot into {0}'s face as {0} lands, plunging the knife deep into {1}. Both are dead, the village is empty, there is no winner...
